name: WPVideoBaker – Repurpose your WordPress Blog post to Video
author: wpgeekil

sections.description:
Detailed Features | Youtube Video Tutorials | Terms of use | User Guide
Video content is a valuable asset. With 1200% more shares than images and texts combined, making videos the perfect blend to increase conversions, boost brand awareness, and grow the audience.

To make your posts more vibrant and engaging, you need to repurpose them for visual engagement. That’s why we come with a video maker plugin, WP Video Baker that enables you to create amazing videos from your blogs.

It’s not just an ordinary video maker plugin. You can turn all your blogs into amazing videos and can choose from any background music for them.
– The easiest blog to video converter
– WordPress video maker
– 1080p resolution video maker in WordPress
– 220+ voices across 40+ languages for voice over
– Speech overlay (Both Free and Premium Versions)
– Video customizer

WORDPRESS BLOG TO VIDEO MAKER PLUGIN LIVE VIDEO PREVIEW

This video was built with WPVideoBaker:

No coding is required. Suitable for all kinds of websites that require a single video player to a large video-sharing website like YouTube/Vimeo.
Now you can convert any post to video right from your WordPress dashboard just in 3 easy steps.

Step -1: Generate Your API key

In order to start rendering videos, you have to register on our official website. After completing registration, you will find your API key on your profile page. You will need it on the welcome page of the plugin to go ahead.

Step -2: The Global Settings

Here you have to give a global style setup for all your videos. WP Video Baker Admin panel allows you to set up backgrounds, colors, and fonts for different video elements. Make your videos more branded from here.
After that, set up your branded opener and ending setting for your videos. And you are all set to render your videos.

Step -3: Build Your Video and Rendering It

This section appears at the bottom of all your post pages in the editor. This is where most of the work is done. Here you can break your post into video sections, add images, titles, and subtitles, and set up an opener and a thank-you section text and voiceover.

After finishing the text, images, and section settings, save it and refresh the page to preview your video. Finally, just click on Generate Videos. Your video will be set to your provided email address in minutes.

The easiest way to turn your WordPress blogs into beautiful videos. Now, share your videos and skyrocket your sales.

PREMIUM FEATURES

  • No Watermarks
  • Self-branding
  • 1000 video minutes per month
  • Top video render priority
  • Priority Support

SUPPORT AND DOCUMENTATION

We do have documentation and tutorial on the plugin website.
Still, Having Issues? We are just an email away. Please write to us describing your issue using the Contact form available under our plugin’s menu. You should receive a reply within hours.
Also, we answer all support requests on the WordPress.org support forum.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install WP Video Baker and get it working.
e.g.
Install using one of these options:
Method 1: Install directly from the WordPress Admin panel: go to Plugins -> Add New -> Search for “WP Video Baker,” and click the Install button.

Method 2: Download the ZIP manually from WordPress’ plugins repository and upload it through the WordPress Admin panel: go to Plugins -> Add New -> Upload Plugin, browse to the downloaded Zip and upload it.

Method 3: Download the ZIP, extract it and manually upload the extracted folder through FTP to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation.
sections.faq:
Does the free account require a credit card?

No. A free account is free, and no credit card is needed.

Can I use your plugin without registration?

You must choose a plan and pass through a quick registration to use our service.
